profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
P&P General Contractors Inc. is a family owned and operated business with excellent references provided by many satisfied customers.  With more than 15 years of experience and many satisfied customers our company is strongly committed to provide high quality of craftsmanship to each and every customer.

P & P General Contractors Inc. is a licensed company and for our customer's protection we carry both liability and worker's compensation insurance on all our workers and subcontractors.  We are a start to finish company and we stand behind all projects performed and backs them with a full 1 YEAR WARRANTY.

We take pride in our perform, thus our customers can always be assured that only the most experienced and qualified people are serving them.  Our top priority is our customers satisfaction and our teams objective is to transform your renovation wish list into a reality.

AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

Process:

Call for free estimate: 416-899-1572

Please visit our website at: www.purpleproperties.ca


Service area Keywords: Landscaing, Renovations, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Additions, Gardens, Design, Decks, Permits
GTA Home Additions, GTA Renovations, Toronto Home Additions, Toronto Renovations, Toronto Kitchen Renovations, Oakville Kitchen Renovations, Burlington Kitchen Renovations, Mississauga Kitchen Renovations, Vaughan Kitchen Renovations, Toronto Bathroom Renovations, Oakville Bathroom Renovations, Burlington Bathroom Renovations, Mississauga Bathroom Renovations, Vaughan Bathroom Renovations, Oakville Landscaping, Burlington landscaping, Mississauga Landscaping, Toronto Landscaping, Toronto Landscaping Companies, Vaughan Landscaping,

Free consultation, recommended design and material options. (Cost for drawings if applicable.)

Written contract will be provided prior to commencement of work.

Our Services Include:
Any Interior and Exterior makeover we design & build, whether its a new kitchen, bathroom, basement, addition, cabinetry, Interlocking & natural stone, Trees and shrubs, flooring, painting, drywall, plumbing, electrical, concrete, asphalt, exposed aggregates, irrigation, carpentry, carpet installation, retaining walls, fences, waterfalls.

profile:
Five times Winner of Best of HomeStars Award
Baeumler Approved Contractor


Demiri Painting & Decorating Services is a Top Rated  Painting company and Home renovation company with years of experience based in Toronto, ON. We serve Toronto as well as surrounding cities including Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Markham, Scarborough and more.

We have over 19 years experience providing quality professional residential and commercial painting services at reasonable prices. We are proud for our reputation for great quality and personal service. Our professional team always works together to ensure a smooth running of job and a high standard of workmanship. Customer satisfaction has been and remains our utmost priority, which is why we we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. Our knowledgeable and highly skilled professional painters are trained with minimum 10 years painting experience.

Quality work that is completed on time and within budget, and exceed costumer's expectation, is just the beginning of what we do for our costumer's. Colour is critical when setting the tone and the mood of the home. It is important to select the right colours to ensure continuity and a flow from one area to the next. Demiri experts will work with you to create a paint colour that compliments your home and reflects your personal style.  

Also at Demiri Painting, we can help you with  Home renovations, Condominium renovations, Bathroom renovations, Drywall repair and installation, Stucco repair and removal, Ceilings flattening, Carpentry, Floor installation and much more!

Give us a chance to paint your house, and we guarantee you won't be disappointed.

Why use Demiri painting & decorating to paint your house/office? 

•Two Years Guarantee On All Work Done 
•Full Workers Compensation 
•16+ Years Experience in the Painting Industry 
•Hundreds of Satisfied Clients 
•Top Quality Paints Used including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, F&B, Ralph Lauren etc 
•Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings 
•100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!! 

Interior Painting Services Include: 
•Painting (ie. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.) 
•Staining (ie. banisters, hardwood floors, cabinets, etc.) 
•Faux finishing 
•Stucco Painting and Repair 
•Wallpapering and Removal 
•Drywall Repair and Replacement 
•Plaster 

Exterior Painting Services Include: 
•Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.) 
•Deck/Fence Staining and Refinishing 
•Power Washing 
•Caulking 

Home Renovations Services includes:
• New build additions
• Kitchen renovations
• Bathroom renovations
• Floor installation
• And much more ...


Your satisfaction is our only goal and we stand behind our work. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of our painting, we will work to make it right. We won't leave the job, and you won't be asked to pay until you are pleased with the results. 

Our reputation depends on it.

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

profile:
Valentini Kitchens has been building and renovating Quality Kitchens and Cabinetry since 1974 to the Toronto and surrounding GTA markets. 
Valentini Kitchens is a true "Family Business" that has been owned and operated by the Pasquariello Family for over 45 years. 
Valentini was founded in 1974 by the late Mike Pasquariello and is now run by his 3 sons, Tony, Piero and Marco. 
We at Valentini Kitchens have maintained a high quality standard and reputation from our first day in business, with our attention to detail and service to our customer as our # 1 motive.
 
Today, we have made changes to our business to compete with our changing markets and with our changes we will maintain our quality and service to make sure our clients are 100% satisfied. We have also implemented a few more cost effective lines of Cabinetry, many that are locally sourced and a few off shore lines to meet the changing markets and cost budgets of our clientele.
 
Valentini Kitchens offers Cabinetry in many options to fit your needs and budget:
- Full custom made line of Kitchen, Bath and various types of Cabinetry and Mill Work.
- Semi custom made locally sourced and branded line of Kitchen, Bath, Laundry & Closet Cabinetry.
- Semi custom made off shore sourced and branded line of Kitchen and Bath Cabinetry.

  
Full line of custom made Residential Cabinetry Options including: 
- Kitchens and Bath Cabinetry
- TV, Entertainment and Wall Unit Cabinetry
- Bar and Built In Cabinetry
- Laundry & Mud Room Cabinetry
- Home Office Cabinetry
- Closet Organizers and Home Storage Solutions



Full line of custom made Commercial / Industrial Cabinetry Options including:
- Office Kitchen & Bath Cabinetry 
- Custom Cabinetry for Restaurants, Bars, Coffee Houses, Hair Salon / Spas, Dental and Doctor Offices, etc.

 
When you purchase a service from Valentini, you are buying into a family that has a reputation of giving our customers 100% of Quality, Service and most importantly Price.
Being one of a handful of the GTA'S Cabinetry Pioneers, Valentini is small in size but is evolving with the everyday changes in the world of Woodworking and Full Home Renovations.
Valentini offers a true complete "1 Stop" shopping experience by providing customers with full Renovation capabilities. We can start with an in home or in showroom consultation and the rest is up to the customer. Valentini can take care of full project management from start to completion. We offer a full range of Renovations to complete selection of Retail Products.
What makes us at Valentini Kitchens Unique is that we are one of the only companies that allows consumers to purchase everything directly from us for use on their Home Renovations, meaning "We Install Everything We Sell". By supplying the retail products we sell, we can insure you as the home owner full warranties of the products we use on the job and also "Less Time" having to run around to have all the products ready on the job site. We take care of showing you the products in our own Kitchens and Bath Showroom and the delivery of everything to your home when it is needed for the Renovation.

 
Valentini also offers a full list of Retail Showroom Products including: 
- Premade Bath Vanity Cabinetry
- Tile, Stone and Mosaics
- Hardwood, Vinyl, Laminate and Carpet Flooring
- Quartz, Granite, Marble and Laminate Counter Tops
- Plumbing Fixtures
 



As many companies grow in size, we at Valentini Kitchens want to remain small in size with our 1 Factory Showroom Location, we pride ourselves in maintaining our high standards of Quality, Service and Reputation that has made is one of the leaders in the Kitchen and Renovation Industry for over 4 decades. As a family business, we offer the ultimate hands on approach with any project we take on.

Valentini offers a 1 hour "In home" or "In Showroom" free Estimate Consultation (By Appointment only).
Please Call or Email us with your inquiries today. (Please leave a voice mail message or email us if we are not able to respond the same day as we may be on the job site, We will definitely respond back to everyone that contacts us as soon as possible ). 

Valentini Kitchens and the Pasquariello Family had its own hot reality TV series called "Building Family" in 2005 on HGTV Canada. This series aired weekly nationwide with a total of 6 half hour episodes. Please click here on the Homestars Valentini Kitchens Video Galleries to watch the episodes and to read up more on this, please visit our website. 
 
We hope all of our past and future customers enjoy watching this show as it shows the everyday life of our family business working together in the real world of Kitchen Manufacturing and Home Renovations with a flare of true reality in our day to day activities.

We are a leading company that specializes in Shower Restoration Services and Tile and Grout Cleaning and Repairing

Over time grout surrounding tiles might crack or soften allowing moisture and bacteria to penetrate causing mold, mildew and water problems to occur. 

MOLD, DISCOLOURED GROUT, LOOSE TILES, AND PEALING CAULK/SILICONE are signs that you can't ignore and we are here to help you!

Our Restoration Services will help you avoid future water damage problems and leave your Shower looking brand new again for a fraction of the cost of a full bathroom renovation!

profile:
Our Services
FREE ESTIMATION K-Wood is pleased to offer free, no obligation estimates! Our qualified design consultants are ready to assistant you in every step of your project and can accurately cost out all elements to ensure there are no surprises. Visit them at our newly developed showroom today! Our showroom is open to the public weekdays from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm and Saturdays 9:00 am to 5:00 pm.
 
Kitchen Cabinetry and Design
At K-Wood, we have over 20 years’ experience designing or remodeling new kitchen spaces and manufacturing custom cabinetry for thousands of happy clients. Our experience and familiarity with the industry is vast, making us well-suited to take on any project regardless of its complexity. Whether you are looking to gain more space or build the kitchen of your dreams, trust that the specialists at K-Wood will deliver results that are beyond your expectations.
 
Bathroom Cabinetry and Design
Our team of trusted design and manufacturing professionals can offer you expert advice in improving the functionality and atmosphere of your bathroom while recommending the best materials for your design objectives. Our experienced team has successfully designed and installed thousands of bathrooms in a wide array of spaces for many delighted customers.


Renovation Services
The K-Wood team includes highly skilled and trained renovation specialists who are all licensed in their respective trades. Together with our in-house designers, they are always aware of the industry's newest trends to bring our customers only the best. Our team of renovation specialists has a large array of industry experience, from basement development to new foyers, and endeavour to elevate the experience each of our clients gets out of their home. 

TRY OUR VIRTUAL KITCHEN AND BATH DESIGNER TODAY AT kwoodkitchens.com



K-Wood Kitchens Inc. specializes in custom designs in the following:
- Kitchen Remodeling
- Bathroom Remodeling
- Custom Built Cabinetry
- Home Renovation

The Bath Solutions Story . . . About Us

Bath Solutions specializes in bathroom renovations of all sizes, from full-scale to partial renovations. profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
RM Renovation is a Toronto based renovation company with more than 20 years experience in the field.
.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. We provide high-quality construction and renovation services as well as give maximum guarantee for our services. Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Our advantages:

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!
specialities: Kitchen Renovation; Bathroom Renovation; Basement Renovation; Full House Renovations
name: RM Renovation

profile:
Gala Renovations was founded with the concept born out of two sound principles: client-centred design and impeccable customer service. Whether your space is wide open with room to imagine, or small and cozy where we have to be creative, we will work with you to ensure that your renovation is completed exactly the way you want it. Our process starts with the ideas and vision you have for your home and moves to our team who will create plans that will guide our craftsmen to build the home of your dreams.


We specialize in complete home, ground and second floor renovations but we also take on other projects like basements, attics, custom kitchens, bathrooms, wall units, and storage solutions. We are flexible and collaborative in our approach and we care about the details that will ultimately beautify your home. At Gala, we leave no stone unturned in the journey from concept to reality. Our passion and knowledge paired with your dwelling and vision, will culminate in a one-of-a kind, unique space that you can proudly call home!

profile:
What You Can Expect from Bravura Kitchens
Bravura Kitchens was established in 2005 by Ravi Thind, a lifelong woodworker who was urged on by family and friends to turn his hobby and passion into a full-time career. Taking a leap of faith, custom woodworking was soon added to Ravi’s list of renovation services and soon enough, Bravura Kitchens was born.

Since woodworking was something we always did for fun and enjoyment, we are able to bring a level of precision and care to every job that others lack. At Bravura Kitchens, we are not only interested in providing you with the cabinetry you need, but also with cabinetry you’ll love to look at and use. Form is equally as important to us as function and no job is ever turned away for being “too difficult” or “impossible.”


BRAVURA KITCHENS
Quality Cabinetry. Fine Design. Excellent Workmanship.
Bravura Kitchens is a top-quality kitchen and bathroom renovation specialist. We have been remodeling and designing custom kitchens and baths in the GTA for over 20 years and have developed a reputation for excellence and value.

We take great pride in our work, using only the finest materials and a strict attention to detail. Your home is your castle and we want you to feel like royalty every time you step foot in it.


WHAT WE DO
We specialize in kitchen and bathroom designs, but we also do custom renovation projects, so if you have a woodworking need, give us a call! We want you to be involved in your renovation, that’s why we work closely with each homeowner on their project. From initial concept and design through construction and the finishing details, we invite you to be intimately involved in your bathroom or kitchen remodeling project. Our #1 goal is to exceed your expectations, which we do through a combination of quality materials, exceptional design, and expert craftsmanship.

 

WHAT MAKES US THE PERFECT FIT?
High-Quality Craftsmanship:
We don’t believe one size fits all. Every cabinet is custom-made to your specifications, creating one-of-a-kind kitchen or bathroom.

Over 20 Years of Experience:
GTA Homeowners have trusted us with their kitchen and bathroom renovations for more than 2 decades. Most of business comes from returning customers and referrals. We let our craftsmanship to speak for us! As a company, we are small enough to make our clients a big deal and big enough to meet their every need.

Family Owned and Operated:
Bravura Kitchens is a family owned and operated business. Every project is special and receives our personal attention. Quality control is implemented at each step of the process to ensure customer satisfaction.

Flexible Appointments:
We meet with clients when timing is right for them. We offer flexible hours to accommodate all clients, which extend to evening and weekends.


We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/bravurakitchens/
https://www.instagram.com/bravurakitchens/

profile:
Are you considering replacing your bathtub? Are you thinking about bathroom remodeling? Before you spend an astronomical amount of money with your bathroon renovation, such as replacing your tub, tiles and sink, consider a much more affordable approach – Dr. Tubs Reglazing and Liners! Dr. Tubs for short is a professional tub refinishing company located in Toronto specializing in bathtub, tile and sink refinishing and resurfacing. Our goal is to provide our customers with excellent service and an excellent product. Our team consists of highly trained and skilled bath refinishers who will bring your bathroom back to life. All Dr Tubs technicians are insured and use only the best refinishing materials available. If you are thinking of remodelling your bathroom or just considering resurfacing your tub, call Dr. Tubs now! We specialize in both reglazing and liners. Both options take less than a day and you can use it 24 hours later. 

We reglaze by spraying high quality epoxy and acrylic paints over the surface to re-enamel it. We specialize in claw foot tubs, cast iron tubs, laundry sinks, standard bathtubs and ceramic wall surround tiles. Don't forget to ask us about our no-slip surface. We now install the highest quality Canadian made high-impact-resistant Acrylic liners for bathtubs and wall surrounds. Our tub liners are ¼” thick, often thicker than the actual tub and they are made to fit like a glove right over the existing tub. They are extremely impact resistant so there is no worry of cracking or puncturing and they come with a 5-year warranty. Our wall surround liners are also custom made and come as either a glossy flat-white or mock tile. Best of all, our turn-around time from measuring to installation can be as short as 2 weeks and everything will be installed within 1 day. Remember, give us a few hours and we'll bring your bathroom back to life! Call the Dr now!

Services we DON'T provide: Dr. Tubs does not replace bathtubs, showers or sinks. We strictly refinish them. We don't refinish floors and cabinets. We refinish acrylic or fibreglass tubs, but we don't repair them. Regarding Kitchens, the only service we provide is to refinish sinks. For laundry rooms, we can reglaze laundry tubs / sinks.  

Areas we service: Toronto, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Oshawa, Markham, Vaughan and Brampton. Please note, that a travel charge will be charged for some locations.

Dr. Tubs Reglazing and Liners was awarded the HomeStars Best of 2017 Award for Bathtub Refinishing in Toronto and we won the Consumer Choice 2017 and 2018 Award for Bathtub Refinishing in the GTA.
service_area: We service Toronto, Mississauga, Scarborough, Thornhill and Brampton. Parts of Vaughn, Richmond HIll and Markham will be charged a travel fee.
products:
Canadian made High Impact Resistant Acrylic Liners, Custom made Liners for Tub and Surround, New Chrome floor drains, New Chrome Overflow plates, New Chrome Pop-up Floor Drain Covers, 
3 or 4 Shelf Corner Caddy Units.
services:
We reglaze / refinish bathtubs, sinks and tiles and install high-impact-resistant custom made Acrylic liners. We specialize in claw foot tubs, cast iron sinks, laundry tubs, standard bathtubs, ceramic tiles and tub surround wall tiles. Dr. Tubs Reglazing & Liners offers a special no-slip surface that is built in to the glaze on the floor of the bathtub. Dr. Tubs technicians can also install a polished chrome pop-up drain cover, as well as overflow drain caps.
We do not replace bathtubs, sinks, tiles, showers, cabinets, floors, etc.

profile:
For all your flooring needs!

Headquartered in Toronto Ontario Canada; MST is one of the pre-eminent flooring companies operating in the southern Ontario region. Our main focus at MST is to cater to the customer and provide them with exactly what they need and want.

Day or night, local or out of town, we are the best choice for your flooring needs.

Founded in 2016, MST has grown to become a leader in flooring installation, family owned and operated since its start is what makes MST the great company it is, and your number one choice.

With regards to this unsteady market and with full awareness of our clients expenditures involved in this new market place MST rates are still one of the most competitive in the market.

Wether it is private, public, residential, commercial, large or small we will confidently take on any project and with almost 2 decades of experience, complete that project to your satisfaction…. We won't leave until you are completely satisfied – it is our guarantee!

When you entrust MST with your project we will utilize every inch of space in an innovative aesthetic and functional manner, giving you the exact look that you or your clients are aiming for.

Our reputation of having a solution-focused project team to deliver optimum service is another factor, which sets as apart from our competitors. Working on some of Toronto's greatest landmarks and with major corporations has given MST a firm grasp on client driven results under the most rigorous schedules and time frames.

How would you like new floors, enclosures, and backsplashes that reflect uniqueness and appeal throughout your residential or commercial property? Count on our company, MST, for detailed tiling work that breathes more life into your home or business. MST excels in tile installations that provide more wonder for your interior while also modernizing your property's decor.

profile:
APV Reno are experienced and highly skilled general contractors, home renovation specialists, and painters providing both residential and commercial general contracting needs in Toronto, Downtown Toronto, North York, Mississauga, Etobicoke and GTA areas in Ontario.

We are licensed home renovators & general contractors with over 20 years of successful experience in home renovations, residential & commercial general contracting, and painting. We also work with other professional construction trades across Toronto and the GTA.

APV Reno’s core business is in Design & Renovations. We specialize in home additions, basement renovations, basement finishing, kitchen renovations, bathroom renovations, and general higher-end residential construction.

Other home improvement services include both interior and exterior painting (residential, commercial, and industrial), interior and exterior renovations, as well as fulfilling the procurement process to acquire building permits in the City of Toronto and the GTA.

Our honesty, professionalism and meticulous attention to detail has granted us our success in the cutthroat general contractors and home renovations industry. This has subsequently helped our company build long-term relationships with both clients and contractors, enabling us to steadily grow over the last 20+ years. As a valued client, you can have complete confidence in our work.

Lastly, our integrity in achieving success on every contract or job regardless of how small or large the project, is the core component to our success. All in all, we strive to be a highly reputable and one of the best general contractors in Toronto.

profile:
Finding your perfect home renovation partner can understandably be a daunting process these days. With so many options and potential risks, people are looking for a partner they can trust.

That's why Royal Home Improvements (RHI) retains single-source responsibility from start to finish. Our hand's on approach ensures your needs are met, from concept to construction. Whether architectural design, the quality of construction, or our strict adherence to timelines and budget, RHI guarantees everything we do and make sure that our customers are satisfied with every facet of our work.

Building trust takes years of delivering on time and budget. It requires committed professionals and a refined process model. But ultimately, it's about respect and owning ones word. This hasn't changed since we open our doors in 1969. Proudly serving the Greater Toronto Area, Royal Home Improvements today is one of the largest multi-phased renovators in Canada.

What can we do for you?

profile:
Thank you for visiting us here on Homestars. We are a full service home renovation company (formerly Lyons Home Improvements) serving the GTA and surrounding areas since 2005.

From minor renovations to complete remodels, we offer a wide range of residential and commercial services. We work closely with our clients to ensure that they receive a finished product that is what they want, not what we want. Our goal is to exceed expectations and develop long-term relationships. We want to be the company you choose for all your renovation needs.

We take pride not only in our work but in the customer service we provide everyone.  Once we begin your project, we promise to be there every day until it is complete, and only then will we move on.  Your satisfaction is our top priority, and our commitment to you remains after the project as we guarantee our work for two years after the date of completion.  

We would love the opportunity to meet with you, discuss your renovation needs, and provide you with a free estimate for any work you would like completed.

For more information, please visit our website at www.lyonsconstruction.ca or contact us at either (905) 427-7776 or info@lyonsconstruction.ca .

profile:
Owning a home is one of the most important financial and sentimental assets that one can have. Beyond building a financially reliable base, you want a home to match your lifestyle and your dreams. When you work with TK Contracting, you’re going to be getting a service that exceeds all expectations through our licensed and bonded tradespeople. 

Our Company
We at TK Contracting Inc.  Are passionate about the work we do. Our commitment is to work with our clients in order to achieve the best results in the project with a safe and timely manner.  We are dedicated to provide our clients with a high level of satisfaction. 

Heath and Safety Protocols
Our policy at TK Contracting is to maintain a safe working environment for everyone. Compliance with health and safety regulations are all outlined in the health and safety policy of TK Contracting.  Our employees are all trained yearly to follow these safety protocols. In order to reduce the risk of injuries at the workplace. 

COVID19 Precautions 
To keep our clients and workers safe, all workers will have a temperature check, and a log to record. All workers shall sanitize before Jobsite, and wear a mask during the entire day. TK Contracting makes sure every team member is tested before working. We are one of the few companies who follow these precautions.

Guaranteed Workmanship 
Our company ensures that each project is handled with good quality materials and professional knowledge to achieve the highest level of satisfaction. We provide a quality service on every project. TK Contracting offers a free written guarantee of 12 months from the date of completion.

profile:
The Concord Group began as a carpet cleaning company in 1983. As our business gained a reputation for quality and customer satisfaction, we began receiving requests for other services. Eventually the volume of requests led us to expand to renovations, interior and exterior decor, painting, electrical, plumbing, and a number of other services.

The Concord Group has become a one-stop-shop for all your home and business needs. We began as a small family organization and although we have grown ten-fold throughout the years, we maintain our dedication to providing a friendly and courteous environment. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

We offer water and flood damage repair, waterproofing, mould removal, carpet cleaning, and home renovations and restoration. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

GTA Bath Solution has been in business for over 15 years offering bathtub reglazing, bathtub resurfacing, and bathtub chip repair services. 
We provide a convenient and affordable service that allows homeowners to upgrade and improve their bath enclosures in as little as 1 to 2 days.

A step above other similar bath enclosure businesses, GTA Bath Solution uses only durable, chemical-resistant, and impact-resistant acrylic products that are low-maintenance and easy to clean. Combine that with the top-notch service that we have been providing for years and it’s obvious why our customers are so delighted with the stress-free remodeling experience that comes with choosing GTA BATH Solution.

profile:
Experience generations of expertise, flawless workmanship, and customer service excellence. For over thirty years, we have used our eco-friendly synthetic turf products to enhance our clients’ spaces.

As one of the key pioneers in the synthetic turf industry in Canada, our passion is providing our clients with spaces where they can relax, enjoy and play – safely and worry free!

We are experts in golf turf, and have worked with some of the most prestigious golf courses in Toronto, GTA and York Region. Our understanding of golf playability is unmatched, and we have worked with golf clubs like Diamond Back in preparation of multiple sites hosting the Canadian PGA Championships.

As irrigation specialists, we understand how to properly deal with water and drainage so you don’t have to. When working with any outdoor element, drainage is one of the most important things to consider and do correctly to get the results you want.

Above all else, we are dedicated to delivering the highest quality products combined with our superior installations and outstanding customer service.

profile:
Happy Reno was formed by a group of experts who share a strong passion for home improvement! With our extensive knowledge and experience, we are dedicated to the common goal of spreading joy to homeowners in Toronto and across the Greater Toronto Area with reliable and affordable bathroom, kitchen and basement remodeling services.

Choosing Us Means:

A Dedicated Advisor – Your advisor will be there to schedule appointments, help you understand quotes, provide you with updates throughout the project and support you until your renovation is complete.

3D Project Mockup – With the help of our 3D modeling you can see your vision come to life even before we begin! This helps us work with you to capture your true ideas.

No Risk – We provide workers compensation insurance and we are under Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB). This is because we care not only about our team but about your safety as well.

Quality Assurance – We source and work with only reputable vendors and suppliers in Canada. We ensure that quality is the least of your worries!

MEANINGFUL
TRANSFORMATIONS

We understand the significance of thoughtful and functional spaces. There is truly no place like home and we want to be a part of the journey in making yours one that reflects your true essence.

Our reputation means a lot to us and we have worked hard over the years to build lasting relationships through honest work. Whether you’re renovating your kitchen, bathroom, basement or a combination of them, you can rely on us for friendly, dedicated and expert renovation services.

We take great care to ensure that everything is taken into consideration for a glitch free renovation project, allowing you to enjoy the results and keep your peace of mind!

BUILDING SPACES THAT
MATTER

Are you ready to live in your dream home? Let the experts at Happy Reno build you the space where lifelong memories will be made!

For over 10 years, KAR Renovation has offered an innovative and professional approach to home renovations. We can transform any room in your home from kitchens, bathrooms and basements to whole house projects, everything from start to finish.

​

We would provide you with a first class facility, from a function, aesthetic and economical view point.

​You can be confident that with KAR Renovation your home is in good hands. We will help you obtain the best value for your investment by providing a quality project completed Safely, On-Time and On Budget.

​Our Mission is to create the smoothest, most enjoyable renovation experience possible for homeowners, We watch over everything such as safety, protection of items that are valuable, and protecting areas of your home that are not affected by the renovation.

​We bring our services anywhere in Toronto GTA, Scarborough, Markham, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Pickering, and Ajax.

​It is very important to us that our clients are happy and comfortable with their project long after we’re gone. We make sure you’re fully satisfied with the final results.

​Call Us today for free consultation

profile:
Residential interior design may be overlooked by many. It’s not until you walk into a well-coordinated and tailored residence you’ll realize what in fact is good residential interior design.
 
When undertaking a new residential interior design project, Dreams Luxury Design provides a complimentary design consultation asking you a series of questions to pinpoint the exact scope of work, leading you in the right direction. Depending on the scope of work of your project, you’ll most likely need to hire a Builder/General Contractor and an Architect along with an Interior Designer. The most common questions Dreams Luxury Design will ask you in order to prepare an accurate interior design proposal are as follows:
 
What is the square footage?
When was your property built?
What is your style? (Contemporary, Hollywood Glam, Modern, etc.)

profile:
WELCOME TO ZGGLTD
Located in Mississauga, Ontario and Big Sky, Montana ZGGLTD is a trusted name in commercial and residential architectural millwork installation and has been known by many for our quality installation, attention to detail, reliability and commitment to customer satisfaction.
ZGGLTD was founded in 2009 by Fadil Selimi with more than 30 years experienced in woodworking trades in shop and installation. 

As 2021 we are member in a good standing of AWMAC Ontario Chapter.

WHY CHOOSE US

ZGGLTD offers a wide range of professional architectural millwork installation services for commercial, properties across Canada and USA. The team of experienced millwork professional installers at ZGGLTD are standing by to serve your needs and make your business stand out with quality woodwork.

As a company ZGGLTD is focused on providing a higher level of services and support to meet and exceed your every expectation. Choosing ZGGLTD for your next project and you can rest assured that you will receive outstanding quality architectural millwork installation.

Here at ZGGLTD we have made it our mission to be the leading company for commercial architectural millwork installation, while maintaining integrity and professionalism by providing high-quality services at competitive prices. This means that we are committed to becoming the company you call when you want professional installation, knowledgeable advice, and a team who will listen and respond to your needs installation with every project.

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
Residential interior design may be overlooked by many. It’s not until you walk into a well-coordinated and tailored residence you’ll realize what in fact is good residential interior design.
 
When undertaking a new residential interior design project, Dreams Luxury Design provides a complimentary design consultation asking you a series of questions to pinpoint the exact scope of work, leading you in the right direction. Depending on the scope of work of your project, you’ll most likely need to hire a Builder/General Contractor and an Architect along with an Interior Designer. The most common questions Dreams Luxury Design will ask you in order to prepare an accurate interior design proposal are as follows:
 
What is the square footage?
When was your property built?
What is your style? (Contemporary, Hollywood Glam, Modern, etc.)
What is your budget
What is your wish list?
What are your priorities and goals for this project?
Will you be using existing furniture pieces to combine with new ones?
When would you like your project to be completed?
At Dreams Luxury Design, quality is paramount. We work with some of the most skilled tradespeople, artisans, and builders to ensure your design is executed to the highest standard. 
 
We service the areas of Newmarket, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Etobicoke, Scarborough, Toronto, North York, Mississauga, and Oakville.
 
Call or text us for a free quote today at 416-786-7434! We accept photos and dimensions as well!

profile:
Welcome to ZAFCON INC your professional expert contractor. 

WHO WE ARE
Our company team consist of project managers, engineers, designers, construction and renovation specialists who are experts in their field. This team has worked successfully together to help our customers achieve their construction objective and dream renovations.

OUR CORE VALUES

Safety - We are commitment to safety to ensure everyone can return to their loved ones at the end of the day. As a result, we ensure all team members and all work is in compliance with safety regulations,  WSIB and Covid-19 protocols.

Quality - Quality distinguishes best from the rest. Our craftsmanship approach ensures that all of our clients receive nothing but the best quality service.

Integrity - We don't take the convenient approach but rather the RIGHT one, even if no one is watching.  

Transparency - The most important core value for us is to ensure our customers receive clear terms and conditions upfront. This will help us build long lasting relationships which further fosters our team culture across all levels of skills and management. 

Services we offer:

Full Home Renovations
Home Extensions and Upgrades
Basement Renovations
Kitchen & Bathroom Renovations

profile:
About Us
Hausvio Inc is a leading Toronto-based home renovations company. We pride ourselves on our eco-friendly, innovative, and professional approach to all of our home renovation projects. From a brand new kitchen or bathroom to whole house projects, our team works hard to transform your living spaces completely.
​
We believe in a more personal approach to home renovation projects. By working closely with our clients, understanding their goals, and working hard to craft solution-focused designs allows us to create beautifully crafted, functional living spaces.
OUR TEAM
The Hausvio is made of professional, experienced carpenters with over a decade in the industry. Each member is well-known and admired in their field for exceptional quality, attention to detail, and talent. We also collaborate with other local professionals, including Architects, Engineers, Kitchen & Bathroom Designers, Electricians, Plumbers, and other specialized personnel, to guarantee we are providing the highest level of service and care for our clients.

MEET THE FOUNDER
Owner/ CEO Wilson is a Licenced Professional Engineer with over five years of experience in the home renovation field. Wilson is passionate about implementing the best methods and practices to help reduce Hausvio’s carbon footprint.

Hausvio is pursuing a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Certificate. LEED is the most widely used green building rating system in Canada and across the globe. LEED is a proven and holistic path to addressing climate change. At Hausvio, we’re committed to creating more resource-efficient, healthy, and resilient homes without compromising design aesthetics, quality, or living convenience.

WHY GO GREEN
Protects Our Ecosystem: Efficient Use of Resources & Energy
Healthier Indoor Environment: Improved Quality of Life
Energy-Efficient: Reduced Operational Cost and Maintenance
Lower Maintenance and Operation Costs
Reduces Strain on Local Resources
services:
Our Services
Your home should perfectly reflect your style, taste, and lifestyle. We listen to your needs, goals, and visions and flawlessly align them with the best building practices to deliver the best possible outcomes for your living spaces.
Kitchen
The kitchen is the heartbeat of the home. At Hausvio, we create kitchens that work for your family, design choices, and your way of living. From contemporary and modern renovations to open concepts and traditional styles, Hausvio works with you to create beautiful, functional kitchens that complement your home’s aesthetic. 
 
Bathroom
Create a luxurious sanctuary in your home. Bathrooms are a place where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate. Our team has experience remodeling various bathroom styles, including ensuites, power rooms, and main bathrooms. Whether you want to create a spa-like oasis with a thermostatic shower system or just refresh your cabinetry, our team can help. 
Whole House
Let us help you make your house a home. If you need significant upgrades to your living space to make it work for you and your family, we offer complete house renovations. Typically, whole house renovations include major elements like the kitchen, bathrooms, interior finishes, flooring, and mechanical systems (electrical, plumbing, and HVAC). 
Basement
Finished basements add additional living space while significantly increasing your property value. We offer fully customizable basement renovations to fit your needs. Our team can add vital functional living space and much-needed storage to upgrade your lifestyle. To add even more value to your home, talk to us about including sub-flooring, lighting, a wet bar, laundry room, built-ins, and upgrading insulation.

profile:
OUR PROCESS

 

When working with GTCC, you will have access to knowledgeable professionals working cohesively to provide you with a finished product you can be proud of for years to come. We will provide honest answers and insights to any questions or querries you have throughout the process.

First, you will start with a free consultation and estimate. This is where we will go over all of your options and approximate budgets. If you're seeking help with a smaller renovation (kitchen, bathroom, basement), we will provide you a fixed price in this phase.

Should you decide to move forward with us for a custom home addition design paclage, you will then move into the design phase. This is where you will meet with our architects and designers and together come up with a uniquely custom-tailored plan for your new custom renovation or addition.

Once we have engineered drawings for your project, we will then cost the project based on these approved drawings and provide you with a fixed price to execute the work in a timely fashion.

When we have agreed on the scope of work and price the real planning for us begins. We will provide you a project schedule and approximate start and completion date. Product will be ordered and we will be on our way.

Throughout the construction phase of the project, we will be in constant contact with you. We will keep you apprised of any pertinent information regarding your project through email and set weekly meetings.

When the work is complete, we will do a final walkthrough to discuss any potential deficiencies that must be fixed (on our dollar) and hand over the keys to your new home.

profile:
TAVAN MADAR INC (TM Design and construction group) is a trusted greater Toronto area contracting company. We specialize in renovation for your home and business office. Our range of services will help improve the look and functionally of your property, with numerous years of experience you can reply on TAVAN MADAR (TM design and construction group) to handle your renovations.

Our team members have many years of combined experience and have provide us with the skill to transform outdate, aging home into beautiful space that fit each home owner’s individual needs with absolute precision.

In a large and popular city like Toronto, major renovation in your home can be a serious headache. This means that even choosing a company specializing in home renovations is difficult. However, we will make your choice significantly easier with our promise to take care of every step in the process. As a full-service design build firm, TM design and construction group is proud to present our comprehensive set of steps, as follows:

- We obtain all necessary permits, set budgets that you are comfortable with, and clearly explain the renovation/restoration process.
- We communicate your need and preferences to our team of architects, designers, project managers, and carpenters during all phases of the project.
- We went to be absolutely sure that you are happy with the end result.
- We complete drawings, architectural and interior designs, as well as house lifting additions and foundation underpinning.

Overall, we make the revitalization process as seamless as possible in fact we went you to have fun!
Check out our portfolio of past renovations for an idea of what our team can do for your home.

If you are interested in performing major renovations in Toronto, please do not hesitate to contact us, simply call or email us to book your free, in-home consultation.

profile: We are a broad spectrum Construction Company that started as a painting company and grew into general construction company, specialising in all of interior renovations / remodeling. We are serving all of Ontario for over 10 years. We have been performing different works in Luxuries Hotels, Residential Homes, Custom Homes, Occupied/Vacant Apartment Buildings, Offices, Restoring Fire Hydrants, Large cargo containers etc. We serve Provincial and Federal Governments, Regional Municipalities, Institutions, Developers, Privet Home Owners, Builders and so on. Our customers are: Defence Contraction Canada, County Of Lambton, Kingston & Frontenac Housing Corporation, Region of Waterloo etc. Working in multimillion custom homes requires a very high standard of workmanship, which we possess and successfully apply on all of our projects. We are very flexible company and can always accommodate extra work, and accelerate if needed to finish ahead of schedule. We have very qualified personal with very diverse working experience which in turn makes our company very adaptive to non-standard tasks.

profile:
Summitcrest Group approaches each project with a structured process that is driven by a strong commitment to transparency, knowledge and collaboration. A process designed to instill trust, confidence and ensure quality.
***
In the initial phase of the project we will meet with our clients to discuss their expectations, timelines and budget. We carefully examine the scope of the project to identify and challenges that may impact timelines, budget and work.  We have over 40 years experience. 
***
Once the work is underway we communicate with our clients regularly to discuss the status of the project and address and concerns or thoughts they may have along the way.
At the completion of the project, we will meet with our clients again to address and deficiencies that may require attention. 
***
Our goal is to ensure a successful and stress free renovation project that is delivered with quality workmanship.

profile:
Haus Renovation Group is a team of licensed and insured professionals with years of experience under their belt operating in the Greater Toronto Area and the nearby municipalities. 

As a company that prioritizes client satisfaction we do not shy away from honest conversations regarding the work to be done. You should never expect to see costs not discussed prior to the start of a project. At the same time however, we stay flexible for any adjustments you may choose to make. Unlike our competition, we do not rely on unnecessarily complex communication mechanisms that leave the client unheard for days. Your project will have direct involvement of the owner that is more than willing to guide you through the evolution of your home. 

At Haus Renovation Group certain things are important above all. Safety is of utmost importance and cannot be compromised putting you or any of our workers in physical danger. We follow every occupational health and safety protocols on job sites to insure your project gets completed accident free throughout all the stages of development and execution.

profile:
At Cali Construction & Design our main focus is Workmanship and Customer Satisfaction.

Incorporated in 2021 our team at Cali has over 15 years of experience in home renovations.

Exterior projects from April through November
INTERLOCK, NATURAL STONE, FLAGSTONE, RETAINING WALLS, ARMOUR STONE, PLANTING, PLANTING DESIGN, LANDSCAPE DESIGN, FENCES, DECK UPGRADES and more

Interior Work throughout the Winter months
FRAMING, DRYWALL, FLOORING, MILLWORK, BASIC RENOVATIONS, PROJECT MANAGEMENT, AND DEMOLITION.

Building Relationships and delivering time and again on meeting homeowners expectations within their respective budget is what we pride ourselves on.

Also working with the best tradesmen in the field is something we take pride in.

We understand that everyone has a vision of what they want. 
It is our Job at Cali to demonstrate our knowledge bringing the homeowners vision and concept into a reality. 
Focusing not only on the "wants" but the "needs" of each respected client.

We are an intimate smaller scale company who's focus is on 1 Project at a time. 

At Cali Construction & Design we don't bite off more than we can chew.
We don't rush projects in order to create more volume.
We are all in to ensure the best possible final product and a smooth easy communication throughout the scope of work.

We are not satisfied until you are.

Welcome to the home of Toronto's oldest condominium refurbishment contractor (founded in 1972), 

Request a complimentary (non-pushy, value-focused) personal consultation to explore possibility around your upcoming refurbishment project by calling (905) 944-1385 during business hours, or completing the form on this page.

During your complimentary refurbishment consultation, we’ll help you with some of the more important elements of your planning, design and build process, including:

✓ Durable material options.
✓ Efficient project workflows.
✓ Budget saving opportunities.
✓ Approximate timelines.
✓ Common mistakes to avoid.
✓ Best practices for minimal disruptions.

And more!

Need a Build Quote?
If you've already got a world-class design ready to go and are looking for a quote to bring it to life, let's talk details and get you some numbers.

In a Tight Spot & Need a Repair?
Do you have some water, drywall, wall covering, flooring, wall or ceiling damage needing some immediate TLC? We can help.

profile:
If you are looking for a trusted contractor for all your renovation needs in Toronto, the search ends here.

RenoPros Home Services is the company to call for professional kitchen, bathroom, basement renovation and other home remodeling services in the Greater Toronto Area.

More Reasons Why Choose RenoPros Home Services?

- Serving the Greater Toronto Area since 1995
- A Trusted Family Operated General Contracting Business in Toronto
- Specializes in Kitchen, Bathroom and Basement Renovation Services
- Team of Highly Experienced Professionals
- High Quality and Cutting Edge Equipment
- Competitive Prices
- Free Estimates
- Your One Stop Shop’ Experience for Home Renovation and Remodeling Services
- Serves Homes, Kitchens, Bathrooms and Basements and other Properties in Toronto & Surrounding Areas

At RenoPros Home Services we are proud to offer a full range of home renovation and remodeling services in Toronto with a special focus on bathroom, kitchen and basement renovations. Your one stop shop’ experience starts here.

We are passionate about improving your space and providing you with your dream home in Toronto. If you are looking for experienced, professional, friendly and innovative individuals then you have come to the right place.

Since our inception in 1995, RenoPros Home Services has been one of the most preferred and recommended renovation and remodeling contractors in Toronto. Our commitment to provide impeccable workmanship at competitive prices makes our company become the trusted contractor of many homeowners in Toronto and surrounding areas.

Our team of highly experienced and trained contractors is knowledgeable and equipped with the latest tools and renovation practices to provide high quality and reliable bathroom, kitchen and basement remodeling services in the Greater Toronto Area.

profile:
ABOUT US
 
Contact us for a free consultation or estimate today!
Ultimate Kitchen and Bath Renovation is made up of top-rated Trades and Designers. We render services to home and business owners throughout the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). For over 20 years, we have provided a full spectrum of services to our clients including complete home renovation and business restoration, kitchen redecoration, bathroom remodelling, and basement finishing , as well as, tile and hardwood flooring, electrical and plumbing services, countertops and appliance installations, and customized carpentry and painting services at a reasonable and affordable prices. We are also one of the leading manufacturer of kitchen cabinets and supplier of bathroom and flooring products in the GTA; Making us a one stop shop for any home or business renovation project.
Our clients' renovation needs and desires are our priority. We are committed to work for them to create a truly client-focused experience. Our goal is to insure that our clients' renovation needs and goals are realized within their set financial budget and timelines. As a result, we open the lines of on-going communication and actively listen to our clients' renovation ideas and concerns while paying a close attention to their personal tastes and styles to ensure that the work is completed successfully the first time.
Our distinctive approach to working closely and building relationship with our clients, our highest quality workmanship, our tenacious project management, as well as, our premium products and materials, our dedicated attention to details, and our care for craftsmanship has lead to countless successful projects execution. At the Ultimate Kitchen and Bath Renovation, we seek to guarantee our clients' satisfaction and to fulfill their needs with every project we undertake.
Let our experience and knowledge work for you. Regardless of your project size, we can guarantee your complete satisfaction in every stage of your renovation process. Contact us today to schedule a free consultation and to get a free estimate on your renovation project.
Our goal is your satisfaction.
 
KITCHEN RENOVATION
 
With the changes in Canadians' lifestyles and the structure of today's family, kitchens are more than just a place to cook. It is the heart of the modern home, a focal point of everyday life and entertainment. As the central hub of the home, kitchen renovations are one of the greatest renovation investments. A practical, functional, and aesthetically pleasant kitchen can add up to 30% to the value of a home or business.
 
The degree of customization homeowners' and business owners' desire for their kitchen can effortlessly be attained with our custom cabinetry and our wide selection of finishing materials. From Modern to Traditional styles, from solid wood to MDF cabinets, and from granite to marble countertops, our clients are rest assured that we have the impeccable products and services to suit their kitchen's interior design that they were hoping to achieve from their renovating project.
 
It is possible to have a modern day kitchen that you were hoping for all these years. It only takes the vast knowledge and experience of our kitchen renovation experts to map out a customized plan for you that encompasses a variety of design elements that best compliments your renovation needs and budget, as well as, your existing kitchen space and layouts. Contact us today to schedule your free consultation and get a free estimate on transforming your kitchen into your customized retreat.

Visit our showroom at 2165 Buckingham Road, Unit 3, Oakville, Ont, L6H 0W7

We Build for Your Comfort
Our skilled contractors can even make your interior feel larger with smart layout planning and clever, space-saving solutions.

Nu Dimensions By ZG is a residential and commercial tiles, stone and marble installers serving homeowners and residents all over Ontario. 
We take great pride in our workmanship and our customer service. Our skilled and knowledgeable craftsmen specialize in all aspects of home and commercial renovations. 
Our services range from flooring, bathroom renovations, heated floors, shower designs, wall and flooring designed, backsplashes to marble and stone installation. We also specialize in the creation of distinctive bathroom and kitchen designs. We work to ensure people’s comfort at their home, and to provide the best and the fastest help at fair prices. 

We stand for quality, safety and credibility, so you could be sure about our work. 
Every member of our team is indeed good at his job and the company guarantees the quality of work.

Nu Dimensions By ZG is happy to help you convert your home into your castle. 
We can help you with all your renovation needs, from a new bathroom to newly constructed home and everything in between.

Free Quotes
Tell us about the type of project you have in mind and we will be glad to contact you and provide a thorough quote. 
Our estimates are free and we’ll explain all the available options and details that best suit you.

profile: HomeReno Direct is one of the most trusted home renovation experts in the Mississauga and surrounding area. We are a family owned business with over 50 years of combined experience. We are a one stop shop, offering you a full turn key service from concept to completion which includes but is not limited to: design, engineering, plans, permit application and renovations. We specialize in Basements, Bathrooms, Kitchens and home Additions. Guaranteed Work: We offer a 2 yr guarantee. Fixed Pricing: You will receive a detailed quotation.
